Package controller

Class ModifyPartController

java.lang.Object
controller.ModifyPartController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class ModifyPartController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class that provides the logic to modify a part Allows the user to modify a preexisting part and checks that the information is valid
Author:
Corey
